summary: A married man and a married woman end up sleeping with each other, and decide to meet at the same place every year on the anniversary of their one night stand. As the years go by, they observe changes in each other and their relationship.
cast: Ellen Burstyn|Alan Alda|Ivan Bonar|Bernie Kuby|Cosmo Sardo|David Northcutt|William Cantrell
keywords: reference to catcher in the rye|reference to jewish guilt|reference to catholic guilt|ocean|cabin
title: El próximo año, a la misma hora
